title: Snowdown Shop Bug
body:
I've been opened my Snowdown Shop and I'm not too disappointed with the offers given to me.
However, I have been offered 20% off Challenger Ahri, and I am unable to purchase it. I purchased the Fizz+Void Fizz bundle just fine, but I can't purchase the Ahri skin at all, it simply says "ERROR: We Encountered an error handling your request. Give it another shot" .
As far as I've read, this has been a problem on the PBE as well, as of about 2 weeks ago.
What solutions do you have for us here? This is a pretty big disappointment.
{{champion:103}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Hey guys,

Please get in touch with player support if you have received challenger ahri as a discount option. They will be able to redeem it for you at the snowdown store price.

support.riotgames.com
How long would it take for them to redeem it for me?
I hope maybe by the end of today, but last time I sent a ticket it was the following day when the problem got resolved.
ohhh makes sense, awesome stuff thanks so much buddy :)
Just brought Challenger Ahri OMG so happy <3

what how?? they replied to you so quick 
still nothing for me :(
it's in the normal store for 50% off.
